title: Mavala Stop - Helps Cure Nail Biting and Thumb Sucking, 0.3-Fluid Ounce
description: A transparent formula with a distinct bitter taste to discourage from nail biting and putting fingers into mouth.

title: Glytone Fading Lotion, 2-Ounce Package
description: To treat.  2% hydroquinone and 1% kojic acid helps reduce hyperpigmentation.  Concentration of 5% glycolic acid.

title: Got 2b Crazy Sleek  Flat Iron and Blow Dry Lotion 8.5-Ounce Bottle (Pack of 3)
description: Works with the heat of your blow dryer and flat iron to deliver long-lasting smooth hair that resists curling.  Provides thermal protection.
